name: A Good Snail Goes to Heaven
name_original: A Good Snail Goes to Heaven
description:
A Good Snail Goes to Heaven

Press and hold the left mouse button to jump. Click to whistle.

All images are public domain and from the very excellent Rijksmuseum (link).

All sound effects were made by me making stupid noises into my microphone at  my desk.

Made with Phaser 3.
